Binary XML Box {{{'bxml'}}}

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)

[Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ISOMFullBox_Version Version]

 Type: *Byte* — an 8-bit (1 byte) unsigned integer <br>The version of this atom.<br>
 
[Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ISOMFullBox_Flags Flags]

 Type: *UInt24* — a 24-bit (3 bytes) unsigned integer <br>Future flags.<br>
 
[Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_BinaryXMLBox_Data Data]

 Type: *Byte[**]* — a stream of binary data with a length <br>Binary XML data<br>
 
== Remarks ==

When the primary data is in XML format and it is desired that the XML be stored directly in the meta-box, one of these forms may be used. The Binary XML Box may only be used when there is a single well-defined binarization of the XML for that defined format as identified by the handler.
